mapper.select: select cpuusage, cpucore, cpuprocessors from mydb.MonitoringDB order by id desc limit 1;
select round(memoryfreespace, 1) memoryfreespace, round(memorytotalspace, 1) memorytotalspace from mydb.MonitoringDB order by id desc limit 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mydb.MonitoringDB (cpuusage, memoryfreespace, memorytotalspace, cpucore, cpuprocessors) VALUES (#{cpuusage}, #{memoryfreespace}, #{memorytotalspace},#{cpucore},#{cpuprocessors})
mapper.delete: delete from mydb.MonitoringDB order by id asc limit 60;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mydb.ServerDB (ServerName, ServerIP, ServerPort, ServerIN, ServerPw) VALUES (#{ServerName}, #{ServerIP}, #{ServerPort},#{ServerIN},#{ServerPw});
mapper.select: select ServerName, ServerIP, ServerPort, ServerIN, ServerPw from mydb.ServerDB;
